txt.en: Fangorn is inhabited by the Ents, ancient tree-herders who lived in that part of Middle-earth long before any other living creature.
You let one of the Ents perish
You let one of the Huorns perish
You let one of the Huorns perish!
While protecting Fangorn from Saruman's forces, you must not let any of the Ents die. These ancient tree-herders must survive at all costs.
Do not let any of the Ents or Huorns perish
